titles.title: North Texas Mobility Improvement Act of 2005
To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a project to widen Interstate Route 35 East in Denton County, Texas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways, Transit and Pipelines.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 1/4/2005--Introduced. North Texas Mobility Improvement Act of 2005 - Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a project to widen from four to six lanes Interstate Route 35 East between Farm-to-Market Road 2181 and Lake Lewisville in Denton County, Texas.
